parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The type of the Metricstore. For example, you can set the parameter to standard to query Standard Metricstores.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Metricstore. Fuzzy search is supported. If you do not specify this parameter, all Metricstores are involved.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start position of the query.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.
